summary: exfat: fix overflow for large capacity partition
details:
exfat: fix overflow for large capacity partition

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.12 by commit 17244f71765dfec39e84493993993e896c376d09, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 1b6138385499507147e8f654840f4c39afe6adbf. For more details please see the references link.
